mapper.insert: insert into review(revnum, revtitle, revcontent, revstar, revdate, hnum, revid) values(seq_revnum.nextval, #{revtitle}, #{revcontent}, #{revstar}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{hnum}, #{revid})
mapper.delete: delete from review where hnum = #{hnum} and revnum = #{revnum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where hnum = #{hnum}
